title: Bitterman's 2022 Predictions, Grammy's Postponed, Pimpin' NFL Picks, Janet Jackson and more.
itunes:title: Bitterman's 2022 Predictions, Grammy's Postponed, Pimpin' NFL Picks, Janet Jackson and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CLO helps a woman dealing with the D-word. January is a extra special month for this here show. Bitterman has some predictions for 2022. Karen spits on Delta. We get Leisure Time with Pimpin' as he gives us his picks. Comedy Roulette involves family at NYE. Janet Jackson will have a four hour special just for us. Would You Rather got Tommy nervous AF! Today in Closing Remarks, we get the real secret behind happiness and peace.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
